This property verifies that the disparity signal becomes 0 exactly one clock cycle after the reset signal is asserted. 

The verification is triggered on every positive edge of the SBYTECLK clock, but is disabled when reset is 0. When reset transitions to 1, the property requires that on the next clock cycle, the disparity signal must be equal to 0.

```systemverilog
property p_disparity_reset_logic;
    @(posedge SBYTECLK) disable iff (reset == 0)
```
